definition: Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: See here for some useful RTM keyboard shortcuts.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一些有用的RTM快捷鍵。

sentences.english: Do you know about other interesting shortcuts which I may have missed ?
sentences.chinese: 你還知道另外一些有趣的我可能漏掉的快捷鍵嗎？

sentences.english: Two steps are a pain, but shortcuts can make that easier.
sentences.chinese: 分成兩步雖然痛苦，但只要一個快捷鍵就能緩解。

sentences.english: I hope these shortcuts will enhance your browsing productivity with Firefox .
sentences.chinese: 我希望這些快捷鍵可以提高你用火狐衝浪的瀏覽效率。

sentences.english: Most of the feed readers provide keyboard shortcuts.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的閱讀器都會提供快捷鍵。

sentences.english: We can’t use any shortcut keys in this simulation.
sentences.chinese: 可惜這個模擬不能使用快捷鍵。

sentences.english: Keyboard shortcut for finding fileschanged to F3 in Explorer interface.
sentences.chinese: 在資源管理器界面中，查找文件的快捷鍵修改爲F3。

sentences.english: By using graphical menus and keyboard shortcuts.
sentences.chinese: 使用圖形界面上的菜單和鍵盤快捷鍵。

sentences.english: You can use this to navigate directly to the browser address bar of firefox.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用該快捷鍵直接把光標轉到火狐的地址欄。

sentences.english: As for the shortcuts, but also access to one of the characteristics of the letter.
sentences.chinese: 至於快捷鍵，也是通達信的特色之一。

sentences.english: Keyboard shortcut key for pasting the contents of the clipboard into the terminal.
sentences.chinese: 從剪貼板粘貼文字的快捷鍵。

sentences.english: For instance, changing table properties is not replicable via this shortcut.
sentences.chinese: 比如說，改變表屬性不能用這個快捷鍵重做。

sentences.english: The 'Enter Chat' Button in the battle. net waiting room is now bound to the 'Enter' key.
sentences.chinese: 戰網上進入大廳按鈕現在對應快捷鍵是回車。

sentences.english: This is the name of the keyboard shortcut to toggle the on-screen keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 這是用於切換屏幕上鍵盤的鍵盤快捷鍵名稱。

sentences.english: A menu item can have both an access key and a shortcut key associated with it.
sentences.chinese: 菜單項可使訪問鍵和快捷鍵都與之關聯。

sentences.english: Select this checkbox to enable the entry of multi-key shortcuts.
sentences.chinese: 選中此複選框可以啓用多按鍵的快捷鍵輸入。

definition: to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
